title: Corrupted Hard Drive? - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Corrupted Hard Drive? - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: Is this hard drive corrupted? Krazy Ken receives a disk that was working PERFECTLY just moments before it was brought into Generic Tech Store. Join him as he troubleshoots, tinkers, and somehow enters another genre of entertainment, through a quasi-lore-infused wormhole.  Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for new content!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #62 - Corrupted Hard Drive?  Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen
